statements: SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT fixture_id, location_id, sensor_value FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total FROM smart_light_fixture_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE location_id = 'c152f9d5-4fad-4ac9-9fee-62066e643739';
SELECT timestamp, sensor_value FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT fixture_id, location_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) as avg_value, sensor_type FROM smart_light_fixture_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING avg_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY location_id, timestamp ASC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) as sensor_count FROM smart_light_fixture_data GROUP BY location_id HAVING sensor_count > 10 ORDER BY sensor_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM light_fixtures;
SELECT fixture_name, location FROM light_fixtures ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE light_status = TRUE;
SELECT fixture_name, location, sensor_id FROM light_fixtures WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' AND sensor_id > 100;
SELECT fixture_name, location, energy_usage FROM light_fixtures JOIN sensor_data ON light_fixtures.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM light_fixtures WHERE location = 'Kitchen';
SELECT fixture_name, location, sensor_id FROM light_fixtures ORDER BY fixture_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM light_fixtures;
SELECT L.*, S.timestamp, S.light_status FROM light_fixtures AS L JOIN sensor_data AS S ON L.sensor_id = S.sensor_id;
SELECT fixture_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM light_fixtures AS L JOIN sensor_data AS S ON L.sensor_id = S.sensor_id GROUP BY fixture_name ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixture_data;
SELECT fixture_id, location, energy_usage FROM smart_light_fixture_data ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT fixture_id, location, light_intensity FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE light_intensity > 50;
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE schedule_name LIKE 'Office%';
SELECT fixture_id, location, timestamp FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE energy_usage > 50
SELECT fixture_id, location, light_intensity FROM smart_light_fixture_data WHERE location = 'Living Room'
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE days_of_week LIKE '%Monday%'
SELECT fixture_id, location, timestamp FROM smart_light_fixture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE start_time < '14:00:00' AND end_time > '18:00:00'
SELECT * FROM SmartLightFixtures;
SELECT fixture_name, location FROM SmartLightFixtures WHERE energy_usage > 50;
SELECT * FROM LightingSchedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT fixture_id, timestamp, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE brightness < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT energy_rate, start_date, end_date FROM EnergyCosts WHERE energy_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1;
SELECT * FROM SmartLightFixtures WHERE location = 'Living Room' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT fixture_name, location, energy_usage, last_updated FROM SmartLightFixtures WHERE energy_usage < 50 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT fixture_name, energy_usage, location FROM SmartLightFixtures WHERE energy_usage > 60 AND location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY fixture_name ASC;

SELECT sensor.fixture_id, sensor.timestamp, sensor.brightness, schedule.start_time, schedule.end_time FROM SensorData sensor JOIN LightingSchedules schedule ON sensor.fixture_id = schedule.fixture_id ORDER BY sensor.timestamp DESC;

SELECT fixtures.fixture_name, SUM(data.brightness) AS total_brightness FROM SmartLightFixtures fixtures JOIN SensorData data ON fixtures.id = data.fixture_id GROUP BY fixtures.fixture_name HAVING total_brightness > 100000 ORDER BY total_brightness DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT fixture_id, timestamp, light_intensity FROM sensor_data WHERE light_intensity > 500
SELECT location, installation_date FROM fixtures WHERE location = 'Room A'
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT fixture_id, start_time, end_time, days_of_week FROM lighting_schedule
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT fixture_id, AVG(light_intensity) AS avg_intensity FROM sensor_data GROUP BY fixture_id HAVING avg_intensity > 500;
SELECT location, model FROM fixtures WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND cost < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT fixture_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM notification_logs GROUP BY fixture_id, notification_type HAVING notification_count > 5 ORDER BY fixture_id ASC;
